attributes.action: Withdraw support from Hamid Karzia instantly as a result of his legalization of systematic abuse of women and the legalisation of child rape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No government should support this systematic abuse of women in Afaganistan their status in that country is less than that of animals. Are our soldiers supposed to turn a deaf ear to the screams of women and girls?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
